price: ߛߴߊ߲ ߘߴߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߬ߞߏ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߊ߫ ߕߟߏ߫ ߕߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߘߴߊ߬ ߕߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬
arabic: لِنَجۡعَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَةٗ وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٞ وَٰعِيَةٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: linajʿalahā lakum tadhkiratan wataʿiyahā udhunun wāʿiyatun
translations: and would be conscious of it
